batch.name: Batch processing
batch.actions.info: The selected action will be applied to all publications currently stored in the workspace. Most actions involve a regular 'save' operation. Please note that this will change the state of each item accordingly.
batch.actions.context.change.info: The items will be assigned to a new context if their genre is also admitted there.
batch.actions.genre.change.info: The items will be changed from one genre to another.
batch.actions.genre.change.reminder: Please note that all metadata fields not permitted in the new genre will automatically be deleted!
batch.actions.item.state.delete.confirmation: Do you really want to delete this items?
batch.actions.item.state.delete.info: The items will be deleted if their current state allows it.
batch.actions.item.state.release.confirmation: Do you really want to release this items?
batch.actions.item.state.release.info: The items will be released if their current state and the selected workflow allow it.
batch.actions.item.state.revise.info: The items will be sent back to rework if their current state and the selected workflow allow it.
batch.actions.item.state.submit.info: The items will be submitted if their current state and the selected workflow allow it.
batch.actions.item.state.withdraw.confirmation: Do you really want to withdraw this items?
batch.actions.item.state.withdraw.info: The items will be discarded if their current state allows it.
batch.actions.localTags.add.info: The following tags will be added to all items.
batch.actions.localTags.replace.info: Certain tags will be replaced within the items.
The content category of file locators will be changed as follows
batch.actions.metadata.files.contentCategory.i: The file content category will be changed as follows:
batch.actions.metadata.files.ipRanges.info: All files with the visibility set to 'restricted' will be assigned to the following IP range(s):
batch.actions.metadata.files.visibility.info: The file visibility will be changed as follows:
batch.actions.metadata.orcid.add.info: The ORCID stored in CoNE for the selected person will be added to the items. Any existing values will be overwritten.
batch.actions.metadata.publication.keywordsAdd: New keywords will be added to any existing values.
batch.actions.metadata.publication.keywordsRep: Keywords will be replaced within the items. You can select between the complete overwriting of all previous contents and the targeted replacement of individual terms.
The review type in all items will be changed as follows
batch.actions.metadata.source.addId.info: New Identifiers (IDs) will be added to the existing sources.
batch.actions.metadata.source.adjustEdition.in: Adjusts the 'Edition' field in all existing sources. Existing values will be overwritten.
batch.actions.metadata.source.changeGenre.info: The genre of existing sources will be changed within the items.
batch.actions.metadata.source.replaceId.from: Value of ID to be replaced
batch.actions.metadata.source.replaceId.info: The values of specific identifiers (IDs) will be replaced within the sources.
batch.actions.running: Please wait, a process is running
batch.logs.details.fill.all: Fill batch with all items from the log
batch.logs.header.title: Title

imports.name: Import
imports.fetch.id.error: Invalid input: The identifier must not be a URL.
imports.fileImport.running: Please wait, an import is running!
imports.list.details.empty: This detail has no logs available!
imports.list.header.title: Title
imports.list.items.empty: This import has no items available!
imports.list.remove.confirmation: Do you really want to remove this import log?
imports.release.confirmation: Do you really want to release this import?
imports.remove.confirmation: Do you really want to remove this import?
imports.submit.confirmation: Do you really want to submit this import?

BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR: You need to be logged in, to change the publication.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_AUTHORIZATION_ERROR: You do not have the permission to change the publication.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_CONTEXT_NOT_FOUND: The specified context was not found.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_FILES_METADATA_OLD_VALUE_NOT_EQUAL: The given initial value does not match the value in the file metadata.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_INTERNAL_ERROR: An internal error occurred during the batch processing.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_ITEM_NOT_FOUND: The publication was not found anymore.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_CHANGE_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED: Unable to set new value. Possible reasons are restrictions to the context or the publication.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_CHANGE_VALUE_NOT_EQUAL: The given initial value does not match the value in the publication metadata.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_CHANGE_VALUE_ORCID_NO_PER: Either the selected person was not found in the data or the ORCID already matches.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_METADATA_NO_CHANGE_VALUE: No initial value was set. For a replacing function the values must differ.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_STATE_WRONG: The publication cannot be changed due to the current state of the publication or its context.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_VALIDATION_INVALID_ORCID:
The ORCID from $2 is not specified in the correct format:
-> $1
Please change it in CONE.
BatchProcessMessages.BATCH_VALIDATION_IP_RANGE_NOT_PROVIDED: An attached file is missing the IP range.

ImportMessage.ComponentContentCategoryNotProvided: An attached file is missing a content type (e.g. Abstract, Pre-print, etc.).
ImportMessage.ComponentContentNotProvided: An Information for a file or locator was entered but no file was uploaded and no locator URL was given.
ImportMessage.ComponentFileNameNotProvided: An attached file is missing a name.
ImportMessage.ComponentIpRangeNotProvided: An attached file is missing the IP range.
ImportMessage.ComponentVisibilityNotProvided: An attached file is missing the specification of the file visibility.
ImportMessage.ConeEmptyDdcTitle: CONE ddc titles are not available.
ImportMessage.ConeEmptyIso6393Title: CONE Iso393_3 titles are not available.

ImportMessage.ConeEmptyMpisGroupsTitle: CONE mpis groups titles are not available.
ImportMessage.ConeEmptyMpisProjectsTitle: CONE mpis projects titles are not available.
ImportMessage.ConeEmptyMpiwgProjectsTitle: CONE mpiwg projects titles are not available.
ImportMessage.CreatorFamilyNameNotProvided: A creator's family name is not provided.
ImportMessage.CreatorNotProvided: At least one creator is required.
ImportMessage.CreatorOrcidInvalid:
The creator's ORCID ID is not specified in the correct format:
-> $1
Please change it in CONE.
ImportMessage.CreatorOrganizationNameNotProvided: An organizations name is not provided.
ImportMessage.CreatorRoleNotProvided: A creator's role is not provided.
ImportMessage.CreatorTypeNotProvided: A creator's type is not provided.
ImportMessage.DateFormatIncorrect: An entered date is not in one of the following formats: YYYY or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD.
ImportMessage.DateNotProvided: If genre is not equal to 'Series' or 'Journal' or 'Other' or 'Manuscript' at least one date has to be provided.
ImportMessage.EmptyChildsOfMpg: MPG organisation structure is not available.
ImportMessage.EndDateWithoutStartDate: If an event end-date is given, a start-date must also be provided.
ImportMessage.EventEndDateRequired: The end of the event can be provided
ImportMessage.EventPlaceRequired: The place of the event can be provided
ImportMessage.EventStartDateRequired: The start of the event can be provided
ImportMessage.EventTitleNotProvided: If event data are entered, an event title has to be given, too.
ImportMessage.EventTitleRequired: The event title can be provided
ImportMessage.IdTypeNotProvided: An identifier is missing the type.
ImportMessage.import_process_delete_failed: An error occurred while deleting the item
ImportMessage.import_process_duplicates_detected: One or more duplicates were detected
ImportMessage.import_process_no_identifier_for_duplica: There is no identifier to perform a duplicate check
ImportMessage.import_process_no_more_items: No more items found in import data
ImportMessage.IncorrectDDCClassification: The entered value is not conform to the DDC classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectIdDoiFormat: Please enter the value without DOI resolver (https://doi.org/).
ImportMessage.IncorrectISO6393Classification: The entered value is not conform to the given classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectJELClassification: The entered value is not conform to the JEL classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPICCProjectsClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPICC project classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPINPClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPINP classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPIPKSClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPIPKS classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPIRGClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPIRG classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPISGroupsClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPIS group classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPISProjectsClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPIS project classification.
ImportMessage.IncorrectMPIWGProjectsClassification: The entered value is not conform to the MPIWG project classification.
ImportMessage.LocatorIsNoUri: The external reference is no valid URL.
ImportMessage.NoMaxPlanckAffiliation: At least one creator must have an affiliation within the Max Planck Society
ImportMessage.NoSequenceInformationGiven: The sequence number or startpage and endpage can be specified.
ImportMessage.NoUtf8CharInAbstract: In the abstract the non conformable UTF-8 character was removed: $1
ImportMessage.NoUtf8CharInAlternativeTitle: In the alternative title the non conformable UTF-8 character was removed: $1
ImportMessage.NoUtf8CharInTitle: In the title the non conformable UTF-8 character was removed: $1
ImportMessage.OrganizationalMetadataNotProvided: At least one creator needs an organizational unit.
ImportMessage.OrganizationNameNotProvided: Organization data was entered without an organization's name.
ImportMessage.PublisherPlaceNotProvided: The place of the publisher can be provided.
ImportMessage.PublishingDateNotProvided: At least one publishing date must be provided.
ImportMessage.SlashInFilename: The filename must not contain a slash '/'.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorFamilyNameNotProvided: The family name of the source creator (person) can be provided.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorGivenNameNotProvided: The given name of the source creator (person) can be provided.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorNotProvided: The creator of the source can be provided.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorOrcidInvalid:
The source creator's ORCID ID is not specified in the correct format:
-> $1
Please change it in CONE.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorOrganizationNameNotProvided: The name of the source creator (organization) can be provided
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorRoleInvalid: The source creator must either be Author or Editor
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorRoleNotProvided: The role of a creator of a source is not provided.
ImportMessage.SourceCreatorTypeNotProvided: The type of a creator of a source is not provided.
ImportMessage.SourceEditionNotProvided: The edition of the source can be provided.
ImportMessage.SourceGenreNotProvided: If a source title was entered, a source genre has to be entered, too.
ImportMessage.SourceNotProvided: If genre is equal to 'Journal Article', 'Book Chapter', 'Conference Paper', 'Meeting Abstract' or 'Review Article' at least one source has to be provided.
ImportMessage.SourceTitleNotProvided: Source information was entered without a source title.
ImportMessage.SourceVolumeNotProvided: The volume of the source can be provided.
ImportMessage.TotalNumberOfPagesNotProvided: The total number of pages can be provided
ImportMessage.UnknownLanguageCode: The given language code does not exist in ISO639-3
